These are processed as array fields - do nothing

Track if we found ourselves without any intermediate arrays: I.e. if the path is a.b then it is only reachable by "b" not being an array. If the path is a.b.0 then 0 is a top level field of the array.
Visits a top level field for an ORDER BY. This skips array types since inner array elements are then visited next.
